description_zh: 是一个致力于推广各种优秀实用软件、网络资源的网站。
description_en: It is a website dedicated to promoting various excellent and practical software and online resources.
submitRequirements_zh: 需要分享对软件的原创使用体验，来稿不一定都会采用。
submitRequirements_en: You are required to share your original experience of using the software. Not all submissions will be adopted.
rating_zh: 若投稿被采用，异次元会在文章中标记你的署名。也可以附上微博、博客链接等联系方式，也获得一定曝光。
rating_en: If your submission is accepted, Yiciyuan will mark your signature in the article. You can also attach your contact information such as Weibo or blog links to gain some exposure.
